summary: Removes the Level up Progress Bar on screen.
descriptionHtml:
This was made to accompany Auto PerksStatsLevel MOD
find it here: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3198

It is also possible to use it without that MOD as all it does is remove the on screen display of level progress.  It does not affect the leveling speed or progress just the visual representation of it

For those familiar with tinkering with the HUD the reference number is 387.

Installation:
Unpack the rar into your skyrim directory
Direct location of install: data>interface>exported
author: RabidNode
